data.persona: I am currently haunting the kings castle tower.  I truly enjoy scaring these poor souls.  They do not understand that it is me.  I once ruled these halls it's king.  Now I will forever haunt them as it's ghost.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
Cold and dark, the moist cool walls enclose all who proceed. With just torches to light the way the large opening gets smaller and smaller.
There's a passage, a dripping water, a wall, a Bone, a torch, an opening, and a well here.
The cockroach and the vagabond are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to thank the goddess for bringing me back to life.
data.mid_motivation: I want to journey to the land of eternal souls.
data.long_motivation: I want to build a new life in this afterlife the goddess has created for me.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the cave to scare the vagabond.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the cockroach, making it appear to levitate.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put the cockroach in the vagabond. The goddess approaches. I have made her laugh.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the goddess into the transdimensional portal.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink the magic potion the goddess gives me.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go the land of eternal souls.
